surfit features

  • Requires little memory for gridding procedure with large grids and large data sets.
  • Implements very fast gridding algorithm called CMOFS.
  • Extends Tcl scripting language with new commands, which enables to describe gridding procedure.
  • CMOFS gridding algorithm features:
    • Interpolation data: scattered data points, ordered data points, 3d contours, isolines, areas.
    • Approximation data: scattered data points, ordered data points, 3d contours, isolines, areas.
    • Other data: trend functions, fault lines, information about function behavior in "holes" where data are missing.

  • Import/Export:
    • Import/Export of Surfer GRD-ASCII files.
    • Import/Export of points and curves from columned text files.

  • Huge grid can be displayed with help of wavelet analysis.
  • Quality of resulting surface is comparable with a surface created by Kriging or Minimum curvature method.


surfit-1.0.0pre
